product_name: Big Agnes Memory Foam Rectangular Pad Kit - Long - 2007 Closeout
long_description: Go ahead and spoil yourself on your next camping trip. This body-conforming pad cover goes on top of your existing pad to add another layer of warmth and comfort between you and the tent floor.
